articles.content:

articles.title: TV tonight: James McAvoy and Sharon Horgan are a couple trapped in lockdown - The Guardian
articles.description: This drama about a husband and wife weathering the pandemic is insightful and gripping. Plus: Sci-Fi on Film. Here’s what to watch this evening
articles.content:
Together
9pm, BBC Two
This spiky drama by Dennis Kelly stars Sharon Horgan and James McAvoy as a husband and wife, trapped by Covid but cheerfully contemptuous of each other. Just as lockdown force… [+2873 chars]
